long_description: The carefree and casual Sunday Afternoons Kauai hat will quickly become your favorite for adventures to sunny beaches. Blend of paper, cotton and polyester provides UPF 50+ protection against harmful solar rays. Hat packs flat for travel and snaps back to shape when you're ready to wear it. 3.5-in.-wide brim with upturned edges shades your face and neck from the sun. Braided headband tie can be used to adjust the fit. Grosgrain sweatband wicks moisture off your brow.
short_description: The carefree and casual Sunday Afternoons Kauai hat will quickly become your favorite for adventures to sunny beaches.
